text: kahaa, aye meri qaum! dekho to agar main apne rub ki taraf se roushan daleel liye hoye hoon aur us ne mujhe apne paas se behetreen rozi de rakhi hai, mera ye irada bilkul nahi ke tumhara qilaaf kar ke khud us cheez ki taraf jhuk jao jis se tumhe rook raha hoon, mera irada to apni taaqath bhar islah karne kaa hee hai, meri taufeeq Allah hee ki madad se hai, osi par mera bharosa hai aur osi ki taraf main rujo karta hoon
